WKT: The occupiers are settling in the houses in the villages of the Berdyan district

name: a new batch of Russian troops arrived in the village of Azov. As Berdyansk Today journalists learned
description: they are actively settling in the empty houses of Ukrainians who left the occupation.

WKT: the occupiers directly tell the locals: we cannot live in tents on training grounds or in barracks. It often comes to us. That's why we're spreading the word among civilians.
They choose houses that will improve. With amenities. The situation is the same in other villages of the Berdyan district.
Local media also reported yesterday about the deployment of military personnel to residential buildings in Tokmak
name: Energodar

WKT: It is likely that the release of houses for the resettlement of the military was one of the goals of the evacuation announced by the enemy.
It is for this reason that the invaders inflame the situation and daily talk about the villages destroyed by the shelling and the injured "civilians".
